c74object.name: fl.sink~
c74object.digest: Outputs audio frames to the host environment by pasting them into an overlap-add buffer.
c74object.description: The length of the internal buffer determines the maximum frame length. Output suffers no latency.

entry.name: 0. /buffer_size [instantiation double]
entry.description: Sets the internal buffer size in the units specified by the units parameter.

entry.name: 1. /units [instantiation enum]
entry.description:
Sets the time units used to determine the buffer size and delay.
[0] - samples [1] - ms [2] - seconds

entry.name: 2. /delay [double]
entry.description: Sets the delay before output in the units specified by the units parameter.
